Name: Snow Clearing Driving Simulator
About the game: Winter is on its peak. Snow is falling and making mess everywhere. Especially on hill peaks temperature is negative. Everything has gone frozen. Movement is difficult in such extreme weather conditions. People are stuck in their homes and shelters. Traffic is jam on highway and swinging hilly roads. Start playing this simulator snow plow game and remove the ice from the frozen roads right now. Be careful, this may sound easy, but you will quickly find out its not! How many levels can you complete? Game Features: - 15 challenging levels to complete. - Multiple camera views. - Real winter snow and ice physics!
